name: Soccer 2017 Games - Real Matches of Striker player
name_original: Soccer 2017 Games - Real Matches of Striker player
description:
Soccer 2017 is a whole new 3d soccer simulation game. It brings 25 different targets of various difficulty levels. Practice soccer skills at your best and meet the targets before your friends do.

Game is designed to have sharp visuals, stunning soccer arena full of crowd and
realistic soccer player behavior and tactics. It will not only let you play with opponent teams but help you in perfecting your soccer skills.

World Soccer contains 20+ top soccer playing nations. Select your favorite team, lead them in Tournament/Knockout competitions, Compete and WIN. Share your achievements with Facebook Friends.

With integrated global leaderboard you can compete the players all around he world. Win big matches and keep your level on the top of the list.

There are four different game modes. You can play either
-Friendly match
-Tournament
-Training
-knockout mode
with your favorite soccer team.

Three beautiful soccer arenas are also added to make your match super colorful.
-Barcelona - Spain
-Beijing - China
-Pasadena - USA

Social:
Join our official facebook page and keep your self updated about new improvements and games.
 https://www.facebook.com/bulkysports

Feedback:
